question: DD India channel will be made available to which of the following neighbouring countries?
explanation: In a bid to boost India\'s relations with its neighbours, the Union Ministry of Information & Broadcasting (I&B) has signed  agreements with Bangladesh and South Korea to make DD India available to viewers in the two countries respectively. Under this agreement, Bangaldesh’s BTV World and South Korea’s KBS World will also be made available on DD Free Dish, which has nearly 35 million subscribers across the country. The move is in line with India’s strategy to strengthen its relationships with neighbouring countries and other Asian nations and will help promote robust cultural exchange.
